body:
Hi

Is it possible for the view from sun component to accept multiple vectors (say from a single day study) and save each view as a named view? It only seems so accept a single vector and I can see anyway to save the view without doing it manually. Thanks

replies.body: Hi Paul, You can't create multiple views at the same time unless you use multiple components (one for each vector) but there is a way to create named views for each vector. Check the attached file. All you need to do is to animate the slider. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KhhA6XZToLqjNTzncJdygOFT-JlxoiC-az5UTu8sFxA55D2Bc*vS3xEMGIgkn-Qbx*xabDr8owMFdz51QtiJrUunljPlFWN9/addNamedViews.png)
This is wonderful thank you Mostapha
Thanks Mostapha. This is great. What would be the best way to animate the slider - HoopSnake, Galapagos?

Try the LB_Fly component (it is located in section 4 of LB).

-A.
